reviews.review:
I got CSGO back in 2018 when the old UI was still a thing, but it wasn't until April of 2020 I believe when I really started getting into this game.

And with the stupid shit systems like Trust Factor, Prime vs non-prime affecting ranks and stuff -- it's still fun.

It's worth trying it out, but you've most already likely played this game already because it's the most popular game on Steam right now.
Amazing game, but not like you dont already know that. Worth the play if your even thinking about it,

Things I gave to Counter-Strike: 
1. Money
2. Money
3. Money
4. Time 
5. Love 

Things Counter-Strike gave me: 
1. Arthritis 
2. Rage 
3, Hatred of Russians, Russians and Indians.
4. Broken keyboard 
5. Broken mouse 
6. 9/10 ready 
7. Server crashes 
8. Retar_d teammates 
9. Competitive matches 
10. "Ez Pz" spam 
11. Multilingual cursing - I guess this is a good thing? 
12. Lag 
13. Cheaters 
14. 64 tick servers
15. Aids
16. Cancer
16. Broken Headphones
17. Bad Grades
18. Debt From Buying Skins

Essentially - CS is a greedy woman, but I love her all the time.
